about_the_game:
“Restricted Footage” is a horror and survival game for up to 4 players. You are entering into an area, where reportedly paranormal stuff is happening. Your purpose here is to take a footage with your action cam and to solve the paranormal case.

Action footage founded
-When you play the game, you actually experience the footage, which has been previously taken. So, due to the camera view, you will be experiencing an unique horror action.

Different paranormal footages
-There is a lot of creppypasta stories going on. So you have the chance to experience solving different paranormal cases through the action camera view.

Realistic approach
-We developed this indie game by using the Unreal Engine, which makes possible the development of a photorealistic environment and also the camera makes it even more realistic.

Team Work
-If you play alone, solving the case will be much more difficult, because you need to accomplish lot of duties alone and interact with multiple items, while you are trying to handle the paranormal danger of the place. Multiplayer experience is highly recommended.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content,Nudity,Gore,Sexual Content

detailed_description:
Join Our Discord


About the Game

“Restricted Footage” is a horror and survival game for up to 4 players. You are entering into an area, where reportedly paranormal stuff is happening. Your purpose here is to take a footage with your action cam and to solve the paranormal case.

Action footage founded
-When you play the game, you actually experience the footage, which has been previously taken. So, due to the camera view, you will be experiencing an unique horror action.

Different paranormal footages
-There is a lot of creppypasta stories going on. So you have the chance to experience solving different paranormal cases through the action camera view.

Realistic approach
-We developed this indie game by using the Unreal Engine, which makes possible the development of a photorealistic environment and also the camera makes it even more realistic.

Team Work
-If you play alone, solving the case will be much more difficult, because you need to accomplish lot of duties alone and interact with multiple items, while you are trying to handle the paranormal danger of the place. Multiplayer experience is highly recommended.
name: Restricted Footage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 15 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB or Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600XT
  • Memory: 15 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: “Restricted Footage” is a horror and survival game for up to 4 players. You are entering into an area, where reportedly paranormal stuff is happening. Your purpose here is to take a footage with your action cam and to solve the paranormal case.
